name: Get Lucky (itch)
description:
At the start of the game, you'll choose to spend three points between three stats: Charm (heart symbol), Intelligence (glasses symbol), and Guilt (eye symbol). From there, you'll roll the dice every round to determine which of your stats will increase or decrease, denoted by the appropriate logo and a plus or minus on the dice. Lady Luck will try to persuade you to let her pay, but you will have two dialogue prompts to choose from to convince her otherwise. The goal is to read the choices closely and play to your strengths for that round, choosing the option that seems like it would relate to your highest stat. Buffed or debuffed stats will revert back to their original value at the end of a round.

Known Bugs:

  • If you skip the typing as the buttons are sliding in or out, the game may softlock on a dialog option.
